content.2: And when he had agreed with the labourers for a penny a day, he sent them into his vineyard.
content.3: And he went out about the third hour, and saw others standing idle in the marketplace,
content.4: And said unto them; Go ye also into the vineyard, and whatsoever is right I will give you. And they went their way.
content.5: Again he went out about the sixth and ninth hour, and did likewise.
content.6: And about the eleventh hour he went out, and found others standing idle, and saith unto them, Why stand ye here all the day idle?
content.7: They say unto him, Because no man hath hired us. He saith unto them, Go ye also into the vineyard; and whatsoever is right,

content.10: But when the first came, they supposed that they should have received more; and they likewise received every man a penny.

content.29: And as they departed from Jericho, a great multitude followed him.
